longBusinessSummary: Wanbury Limited manufactures and sells formulations and active pharmaceutical ingredients (API) in India and internationally. The company offers formulations for gynecology, orthopedics, hematinic, anti-diabetic, nutraceuticals, gastro intestinal, stroke surgery, antibiotics, cough and cold solutions, anti-inflammatory, analgesics, and general practitioner. It also provides API products for anti-diabetic, anti-analgesic, anti-depressant, anti-histaminic, anti-inflammatory, anti-arthritis, anti-thrombotic, anti-epileptic, and anti-hypertensive therapeutic areas. The company was formerly known as Pearl Organics Limited and changed its name to Wanbury Limited in 2004. Wanbury Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Navi Mumbai, India.
